actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow every individual to designate that $1 of his income tax payment shall be paid into the special account for the reduction of the public debt.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals to designate one dollar of their income tax liability to be used for the purpose of reducing the public debt of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow every individual to designate that $1 of his income tax payment shall be paid into the special account for the reduction of the public debt.
